title: FS: Autographed T206 George McBride New PSA 2-Auto Grade PSA 9 SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: Autographed T206 George McBride New PSA 2-Auto Grade PSA 9 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Great card and great color-the autograph is perfectly placed in my opinion and the price is great for a autographed T206. The price is SOLD PayPal friends/family please. Thank you. 

Joe K

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=514175&d=1651072711[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=514176&d=1651072716[/IMG]
Pretty card.  Sadly, my bankroll in not deep enough to pursue signed sets of 52T, 33G and T206 simultaneously.
